string-array.name: quran_quotes
string-array.item: #VerseOfTheDay: \"And hold fast, all of you together, to the Rope of Allah and be not divided among yourselves…\" (3:103)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"O mankind, there has come to you instruction from your Lord and healing for what is in the breasts…\" (10:57)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"…This revelation is no fabrication: it is a confirmation of the truth of what was sent before it…\" (12:111)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"…[This revelation] is an explanation of everything; a guide and a blessing for those who believe.\" (12:111)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"…These are the verses of the Book. What has been sent down to you from your Lord is true, but most of the people do not believe.\" (13:1)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"…truly it is in the remembrance of Allah that hearts find peace.\" (13:28)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"We have, without doubt, sent down the Qur\'an; and We will assuredly guard it.\" (15:9)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"… We have sent down to you the Book as clarification for all things and as guidance and mercy and good tidings for the Muslims.\" (16:89)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"So when you recite the Qur\'an, seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the expelled.\" (16:98)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"Indeed, this Qur\'an guides to that which is most suitable…\" (17:9)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"…[this Qur\'an] gives good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a great reward.\" (17:9)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"We have divided the Qur\'an in portions, so that you may recite it to the people gradually, and We have revealed it little by little.\" (17:106)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"And recite what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord. There is no one to change His words, and you will never find a refuge beside Him.\" (18:27)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"…When the verses of the Most Merciful were recited to them, they would fall down prostrating and weeping.\" (19:52)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"It was not to distress you [Prophet] that We sent down the Qur\'an to you, but as a reminder for those who hold God in awe…\" (20:2-3)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"Is it not sufficient for them that We have sent down to you the Book that is being recited to them?…\" (29:51)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"…Indeed in that [the Qur\'an] is a mercy and reminder for a people who believe.\" (29:51)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"This is a blessed Book We have revealed to you, that they may might reflect upon its verses…\" (38:29)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"And We have certainly made the Qur\'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?\" (54:17)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"We shall teach you [the Qur\'an] and you will not forget â€“ unless God wishes; He knows both what is open and what is hidden.\" (87: 6-7)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"The example of a believer who recites the Qur\'an regularly is like a citron whose fragrance is sweet and whose taste is good…\" (Al-Bukhari)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"The best of you are those who learn the Qur\'an and teach it.\" (Al-Bukhari)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"The metaphor of someone who knows the Qur\'an is that of tied camels. If he keeps them tied, he will control them. If he releases them, they will run away.\" (Al-Bukhari)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"…you must keep on reciting the Qur\'an because it escapes from the hearts of men faster than camel do.\" (Al-Bukhari)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"Keep on reciting the Qur\'an… it slips away faster than camels that are released from their tying rope.\" (Al-Bukhari)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"Do not make your houses as graveyards for Satan runs away from the house in which Surah Al-Baqarah is recited.\" (Muslim)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"Recite the Qur\'an regularly… it escapes one\'s memory faster than camels that are released from their tying ropes.\" (Muslim)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"It will be said to the companion of the Qur\'an: \'Recite and rise in status, recite as you used to recite in the world…\'\" (Al-Tirmidhi)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"Whoever recites a letter from the Book of Allah, he will be credited with a good deed…\" (Al-Tirmidhi)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"…the superiority of Allah\'s speech over the speech of others is like the superiority of Allah over His creation.\" (Al-Tirmidhi)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"The people of the Qur\'an are the people of Allah and His special servants.\" (Al-Nasa\'i)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"Hold fast to the recitation of the Qur\'an, for it will be a light for you on this earth and a treasure for you in the heavens.\" (Ibn Hibban)
#QuoteOfTheDay: \"Weeping is recommended while reciting the Qur\'an or witnessing its recitation…\" (Al-Ghazali)
#QuoteOfTheDay: \"Crying when reciting the Qur\'an is the characteristic of those who knew Allah and is the distinguishing mark of the righteous.\" (Al-Nawawi)
#QuoteOfTheDay: \"If your hearts were truly pure, you would not have enough of the Qur\'an…\" (Uthman ibn Affan)
#QuoteOfTheDay: \"…I do not like for one day and night to pass by except that I have to look at the book of Allah.\" (Uthman ibn Affan)
#DuaOfTheDay: \"[O Allah! I ask You that You make the Qur\'an] the Spring of my heart and the light of my breast.\" (Musnad Ahmad)
#DuaOfTheDay: \"[O Allah! I ask You that You make the Qur\'an] a departure for my sorrow and a release for my anxiety.\" (Musnad Ahmad)
